Dear old heart Canguçu, November 22, 1835.

Here we are with the wind in our face, and who knows when it will allow us to proceed, etc., etc. I am writing just to give you news of myself, recommend me to all our people, especially to our children, receiving the heart of

Your old heart Almeida.

The yacht was already safe, and I think it will be there soon.

Mrs. Bernardina Barcelos de Almeida by the grace of Lord Leão Próspero Chastan. Pelotas. Rio Grande.
